title: All eligible hutment dwellers residing on the area of the S
clause_text: All eligible hutment dwellers residing on the area of the S.R.S. shall have to be accommodated on the same plot as far as possible.
section: Provision relating to allotment of tenements either in situ or otherwise, on ownership or on rent to the other non-protected occupiers

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
